course_title: Modern Jpn Lit in Engl Translation
course_description: Surveys Japanese literature from the mid-19th century to the present. Introduces the nature and range of literary genres as they developed in the context of Japan's confrontation with modernity. The course opens for discussion issues in contemporary literary theory in order to understand aspects of Japanese literature and culture, such as gender, nationalism, intertextuality, Orientalism, and identity. Texts are in English translation.
sections: Class Nbr: 2402, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: J. Bullock, Status: Open
